name: Cosmic Wanderer
description:
Cosmic Wanderers is a science fiction RPG game derived from Zelda but with an outlook and theme on a lone astronaut having to survive, collect, grind and explore strange new worlds and deal with enemies whenever necessary. 

Controls: Q is to pull up the inventory box. C and X are to select and use items in the inventory system when out in the field. Z is to wield the light saber and attack enemies with.

The game will cost $2.99 if any user wishes to play the game without internet access and on their desktop.
